Title: Relates to certain conditions for a grant of permission for access to adjoining property to make improvements or repairs
Summary: Relates to the notice required to be made for a grant of permission for access to adjoining property to make improvements or repairs.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Amd ยง881, RPAP L (as proposed in S.3799-C & A.357-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to certain conditions for a grant of permission for access to adjoining property to make improvements or repairs
